scripts.dev: concurrently -p "{time} | {name} | " --timestamp-format 'HH:mm:ss' -n " backend,frontend" -c "blue.bold,green.bold" "npm run dev-backend" "npm run dev-frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build-backend && npm run build-frontend
scripts.build-backend: cd backend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build-frontend: cd frontend && npm install && next build
scripts.postinstall: (cd backend && npm install) && (cd frontend && npm install)
